attributes.action: new regulations coming into effect for type 1 and type 2 diabetics using insulin in oct 2011
attributes.additional_details: new regulations for diabetics using insulin comes into effect in october 2011, its so unfair as alot of diabetics need to drive to get to work..which they obviously need for there livliehood..if there licence is took away they will lose there jobs and even there homes....which will be disastrous.
